data.text: Me siu Samuel mo lawua, me Huqe mo tino meie. Huqe he siregi na leo noi Samuel tea vena soi talo tano.
Me doluegi Israel tavuigi Dan mo dadari Bereseba ngere rau ilo ve Huqe mo rivu Samuel mwere na nona tangaloi ligoligogi.
Me Huqe mo vomai tuqaravu lo Saelo, huri mo vosangie lawe Samuel lo Saelo duruhi na nona leo.
